text: Why do I get a julia process that continues running at 80% CPU after ´using IJulia; jupyterlab()`, even though I only have a single notebook open and it isn’t doing any work?

elements.text: Why do I get a julia process that continues running at 80% CPU after ´using IJulia; jupyterlab()`, even though I only have a single notebook open and it isn’t doing any work?

text: Killing the notebook doesn’t automatically kill the Julia process. I guess sometimes it does, and other times not.

elements.text: Killing the notebook doesn’t automatically kill the Julia process. I guess sometimes it does, and other times not.

text: I believe what you are running into is related to this issue I also helped report on <@U73KENNG4> - <https://github.com/JuliaLang/IJulia.jl/issues/977>

elements.text: I believe what you are running into is related to this issue I also helped report on

text: that doesn’t really explain why it would run at high CPU, though, does it?

elements.text: that doesn’t really explain why it would run at high CPU, though, does it?

text: No. Maybe it was using high CPU already?

elements.text: No. Maybe it was using high CPU already?

text:
I wonder if this would have anything to do with this warning I get on the console?
```[I 09:49:13.727 LabApp] Adapting from protocol version 5.0 (kernel 1c9530ad-eacc-48d7-b113-02867838916c) to 5.3 (client).```

elements.text: I wonder if this would have anything to do with this warning I get on the console?
[I 09:49:13.727 LabApp] Adapting from protocol version 5.0 (kernel 1c9530ad-eacc-48d7-b113-02867838916c) to 5.3 (client).

text:
Here’s what happens when I ctrl-c it from the console:
```Shutdown this notebook server (y/[n])? ^C[C 09:50:47.371 LabApp] received signal 2, stopping
[I 09:50:47.373 LabApp] Shutting down 1 kernel
No answer for 5s: resuming operation...
[I 09:50:52.541 LabApp] Kernel shutdown: 1c9530ad-eacc-48d7-b113-02867838916c
[I 09:50:52.542 LabApp] Shutting down 0 terminals
[I 09:50:52.546 LabApp] KernelRestarter: restarting kernel (1/5), keep random ports
kernel 1c9530ad-eacc-48d7-b113-02867838916c restarted
kernel 1c9530ad-eacc-48d7-b113-02867838916c restarted
(base) arihuttunen@The-Best-MacBook-Pro peer-reviews % ┌ Warning: this kernel.jl is different from the one provided by IJulia
│   this_kernel_file = "/Users/arihuttunen/.julia/packages/IJulia/ljYVo/src/kernel.jl"
│   ijulia_kernel_file = "/Users/arihuttunen/.julia/packages/IJulia/IDNmS/src/kernel.jl"
└ @ Main ~/.julia/packages/IJulia/ljYVo/src/kernel.jl:7
Starting kernel event loops.```
It certainly looks like there is some problem with that 5 seconds line. Maybe Julia stops too slowly for Jupyter?
